nouns: Basic emotion

Anger is a common emotional response to real or imagined threats or harm to oneself or others, characterized by a desire, whether internalized or expressed, to engage in aggressive retaliation.
A fist bump is a gesture similar in meaning to a handshake or high five.

That part of the fore limb below the forearm or wrist in primates (including humans).
The part of the fore limb below the forearm or wrist in a human, and the corresponding part in many other animals.

Part of the fore limb.

A hand, as the part of the fore limb below the forearm in a man, or the corresponding part in other vertebrates.

The raised fist is a symbol of solidarity and support.

description: This version of the  Oncoming Fist emoji has the  Medium Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Moderate Brown Skin Tone on supporte
apple_vendor_description: Apple's rendition of the oncoming fist emoji with a medium skin tone features a powerful, clenched fist directed forward, rendered with striking 3D depth and dynamic shading. The glossy highlights and smooth, rounded knuckles convey a sense of impact and assertiveness, typical of Apple's tactile design language. This emoji is often used to signify agreement, a high-five, solidarity, or a strong endorsement.
